title: Ground News - Two Southie churches broken into, K-9 Duke helps bust suspect in basement: Boston Police
text:
Summary by Boston Herald A couple of Southie churches were broken into within a few hours overnight, according to Boston Police who arrested three suspects with the help of K-9 Duke. Share menu More
